citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 1:00PM on 29 July
2025. The inspector attempted to contact the licensee/registrant by honking horn, tried calling, left card at gate, returned
to cell service area called and left message and waited 30 minutes, called again, drove back to facility and honked horn
again with no response. Failure to provide access to the facility, animals, and records for inspection is a serious violation
of the AWA and regulations.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 1:00PM on 29 July 
2025. The inspector attempted to contact the licensee/registrant by honking horn, tried calling, left card at gate, returned 
to cell service area called and left message and waited 30 minutes, called again, drove back to facility and honked horn 
again with no response. Failure to provide access to the facility, animals, and records for inspection is a serious violation 
of the AWA and regulations. 
 
 
End Section
